org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.mapreduce.wrapper

类 HadoopInputSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.core.io.LocatableInputSplit
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.hadoop.mapreduce.wrapper.HadoopInputSplit
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, InputSplit

    public class HadoopInputSplit
extends LocatableInputSplit
    A wrapper that represents an input split from the Hadoop mapreduce API as a Flink InputSplit.
    另请参阅:
